content: In adolescence, I hated life and was continually on the verge of suicide, from which, however, I was restrained by the desire to know more mathematics.
translations: ita:Nell'adolescenza, odiavo la vita ed ero continuamente sull'orlo del suicidio, dal quale, tuttavia, ero trattenuto dal de
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
